snippet: A company called Pixel Optics is demonstrating eyeglasses that pass an electronic current through liquid crystals to change the prescription, but the price may leave you cross-eyed.
abstract: A company called Pixel Optics is demonstrating eyeglasses that pass an electronic current through liquid crystals to change the prescription, but the price may leave you cross-eyed.

headline.main: Spectacles That Change Prescriptions on the Fly
